metadata.inclusion:
1. Power Up The Device.
2. Set Z-Wave Controller Into Inclusion Mode
3. Press And Hold The Button For 5s Until White Led Lights Is On, Then Release The Button Before Led Turn Off.
Blue Led Will Blink With 1s Interval Until Inclusion Successful.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Power Up The Device.
2. Set Z-Wave Controller Into Exclusion Mode
3. Press And Hold The Button For 5s Until White Led Lights Is On, Then Release The Button Before Led Turn Off.
Blue Led Will Blink With 0.5sinterval Until Exclusion Successful.
metadata.reset:
1. Power Up The Device.
2. Press And Hold The Button For 10s Until Pink Led Lights Is On, Then Release The Button Before Led Turn Off.

paramInformation.label: Binary Sensor Report
paramInformation.description: Enable SENSOR_BINARY_REPORT When Device Detects A Door/Window Opened Or Closed Event.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Offset Value
paramInformation.description: The Current Measuring Temperature Value Can Be Add And Minus A Value By This Setting. Temperature Offset Value = [Value] × 0.1 Degree Celsius / Fahrenheit (Us).Temperature Offset Value = [Value] × 0.1 Degree Celsius / Fahrenheit (Us).

paramInformation.label: Humidity Offset Value
paramInformation.description: The current measuring humidity value can be add and minus a value by this setting. Humidity Offset Value = [Value] × 0.1 RH%.

paramInformation.label: Temperature D-Value Setting
paramInformation.description: Sets The Changed Value Of The Temperature. When The Difference From The Last Report Exceeds This Setting Value, The Device Will Report Current Temperature Value To Z-Wave Hubs. The D-Value = [Value] × 0.1 Degree Celsius / Fahrenheit (Us).

paramInformation.label: Humidity D-Value Setting
paramInformation.description: Sets The Changed Value Of The Humidity. When The Difference From The Last Report Exceeds This Setting Value, The Device Will Report Current Humidity Value To Z-Wave Hubs. The D- Value = [Value] × 0.1 Rh%.

paramInformation.label: Basic Set Value
paramInformation.description: Sets The Level For Device Sending BASIC_SET To Nodes That Associated In Group 2 When Device Detects A Door/Window Opened Event.  [1 … 99] On. - Basic_Set = [Setting Value].

options.label: Off - BASIC_SET = 0x00 All Nodes Associated In Group 2 Will Be Off

paramInformation.label: Basic Set Off Delay Time
paramInformation.description: Sets the Time Delay for Device sending BASIC_SET = 0x00 to Nodes that Associated in group 2 when Device detects a Door/Window closed event.  [1 … 30000] – Time delay count.

paramInformation.label: Sensor Measuring Interval
paramInformation.description: The Time Interval For Sensor Measuring Interval Time. This Value Is Larger, The Sensor Values Updates Slowly.
